definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The libtard morons got change but for the worse.
sentences.chinese: 自由主义白痴们改变了，但却变得更糟。

sentences.english: De Roquefort allowed the fool a victory.
sentences.chinese: 雷孟达允许这个白痴一点小小的胜利。

sentences.english: I mean , he is the king of idiots.
sentences.chinese: 我的老板真是愚蠢，我的意思是他是个大白痴。

sentences.english: How did the so smart brain ask a so idiotic answer?
sentences.chinese: 那么聪明的脑袋瓜怎么问了这么白痴的问题？

sentences.english: “Idiot, ” I say, my mouth full of rice.
sentences.chinese: “白痴，”我说，我的嘴里满是米饭。

sentences.english: I handed you an idiot-proof team.
sentences.chinese: 我把一个保证没有白痴的队伍交给你。

sentences.english: He appeared on the radio show as part of tour to promote his book “Conventional Idiocy.
sentences.chinese: 他曾出现在一次广播节目中宣传他的书《传统白痴》。

sentences.english: PVC: The drongos at FSUW would call it the ship of fools, eh, vice-chancellor? [Laughter]
sentences.chinese: FSUW的傻帽可以叫它白痴之船，对吧，副校长？

sentences.english: If a person likes everything, it means he is an idiot.
sentences.chinese: 一个人要是什么都喜欢，他肯定是白痴。

sentences.english: Maybe the idiot can give us all a mass Gungan funeral.
sentences.chinese: 也许那个白痴能给我们举行一次集体刚根式葬礼。

sentences.english: Calling Rena an idiot would be a real insult.
sentences.chinese: 骂蕾娜是白痴真是一种侮辱。

sentences.english: Duh. I felt like an idiot.
sentences.chinese: 呃，我感觉像自己是个白痴。

sentences.english: So, like an idiot, I bought new shoes.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我像个白痴一样买了双新鞋。
我讨厌那种白痴的声音。

sentences.english: To borrow an expression of Lenin’s, we were useful idiots.
sentences.chinese: 借用列宁的话说，我们不过是“有用的白痴”。

sentences.english: But I hadn`t ever said that work or hers was idiotic.
sentences.chinese: 但我没说过我的功课或她的工作是白痴的呀。

definition: stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion
